Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Colin Kaepernick immediately lost his Nike endorsement after an anti-white rant, which is not true.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Nike did not end its deal with Colin Kaepernick due to any anti-white remarks.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a made-up story published by a website that claims to be satire.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Nike ended its endorsement deal with Kaepernick based on false information.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting false information and misleading readers.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
